stories.text: I don’t like them, therefore I never watch them. I’ve even gone the extra mile and clicked don’t show me these videos. I’ve never liked or followed any of these pages, or any of their posts. And yet my FB Watch is full of these videos.
stories.title: Ask HN: Why is FB constantly showing me “First Amendment audit” videos?

stories.text:
Given that we are in unprecedented economic times, a fantastic economic simulator would be very valuable.

Not because it would be correct. Rather because it could potentially identify high probability situations we haven't thought of.

What are the best projects of the kind that you're aware of? Does anyone know how this is done at the Federal Reserve?
stories.title: Ask HN: Economy Simulator
